Name: Flicker of Hope
About the game: Join Jean Wick in his quest to restore hope to a dying world by carrying on a dead monk’s mission to fill the cathedral with light. Use Jean’s douter and a mix of waxy tricks to avoid being detected by Mara, a nun who succumbed to despair as she tried to heal the overwhelming tides of plague victims, and the Legiones, giant insects who feast on the dead. Travel deep into the darkness to bring the world back to the light, or die trying. Flicker of Hope was developed by Studio Whip, a group of students at Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy (FIEA), over the course of eight months.
Meta Title: Flicker of Hope: Aug 2, 2020, Studio Whip and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Flicker of Hope? Check out the release date (Aug 2, 2020), developer insights from Studio Whip, and a complete game summary.
